snippet: The success of the “Gangnam Style” video, by a midlevel star who goes by Psy, has fueled grand ambitions by a district that wants to be known as a center of conspicuous consumption.
abstract: Seoul Journal; Gangnam district in Seoul, South Korea's opulent stamping grounds of nation's nouveau riche, wants to capitalize on viral dance video Gangnam Style by honoring rapper Psy; local government has built plywood stage decorated with cutout silhouettes of star, whose real name is Park Jae-sang, in effort to increase tourism.
lead_paragraph: The success of the “Gangnam Style” video, by a midlevel star who goes by Psy, has fueled grand ambitions by a district that wants to be known as a center of conspicuous consumption.

headline.seo: Flaunting ‘Gangnam Style,’ Trendy Area Urges Visitors to Prance In
headline.main: Trendy Spot Urges Tourists to Ride In and Spend, ‘Gangnam Style’
headline.print_headline: Trendy Spot Urges Tourists to Ride In and Spend, ‘Gangnam Style’
